FileFormat.FormatDescription: Adobe PhotoDeluxe is the native format of files produced by PhotoDeluxe, a raster graphics editor line published by Adobe from 1996 to 2002. It is based on the Adobe Photoshop file format.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 04/2024 (v.118)- Description created. Submitted by Archives nationales (French National Archives) as part of PRONOM Research Week 2023.
